page.title: 20CREDITS PAGE
page.content:
These pages have been compiled by the children, staff and parents of three schools in Wakefield.{Flanshaw 5 to 9 {First school, Lawefield 9 to 13 Middle {school and Wakefield District College.
Mrs.K.Ladley, Mrs.J.A.Green, Mr.P.R.Ord and Mr.C.E.Spavin acted as school co-ordinators and much help was received from many local people in all walks of life.
Great interest was shown in the survey and much was gained by those who took part and the co-ordinators would like to express their thanks to all contributors.
